name: Puzzle Master
description: Puzzle Master is a classic puzzle game with relaxing music.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Windows7, Windows8, Windows10 Processor: Dual Core+ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB+ Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows7, Windows8, Windows10 Processor: Core i3,i5,i7,+++ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB+ Storage: 300 MB available space
